text: Gosha academy, after school.
Exams hell week had ended, and we were messing around.

name: Me
text: Ahh～... It's finally over.

name: Uehara Shikanosuke
text: You said it...
I was already teetering on the borderline, but this time we had the mission to investigate a witch,
so I had thought that my grades were going to be completely decimated from lack of study.

name: Me
text: (Man, I really got my ass saved...)
However with the help of Hebiko and Shikanosuke, as well as Kirara-senpai whom I befriended during the mission,
I had somehow managed to get results just a little below average.
And, right now.

name: Me
text: (So bored...)
I had no urgent mission, exams had just ended and I didn't feel like training.
There were many things on my mind. The demonic power that I had awakened for one, as well as the "demonic fate" that the witch had talked about for another.
But that being said, so far I had no new clues about anything related to them...

name: Girl
text: Ahh, Mizuki-san and Aishu-san. Well done on the exams～!

name: Me
text: Hmm?

name: Mizuki Yukikaze
text: Ah. Well done everyone～♪ Those exams were crazy, rightー?

name: Aishu Hebiko
text: Hehe. Did heberybody else manage?

name: Shikanosuke
text: Oh. That's Hebiko and Yukikaze huh.
Our usual member Hebiko had entered the cafeteria, along with the loud and ferocious girl, Mizuki Yukikaze.

name: Me
text: That's a rare combo huh? Hebiko and Yukikaze together.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Is it? They seem to get along pretty well.

name: Me
text: Hmm...

name: Shikanosuke
text: I mean, Yukikaze gets along with everyone.

name: Shikanosuke
text: She's cute, strong, open-hearted and she's friendly.

name: Shikanosuke
text: I think you're the only one who kind of gets in a fight with her every time you talk.

name: Me
text: L-Leave me alone! She's... my natural enemy!
Being rather asocial and a loner, I was her complete opposite. It was quite inevitable for us to get along like cats and dogs.

name: Hebiko
text: Ah. Well done on the exams you two～

name: Me
text: Hey, Hebiko.
As we were talking, Hebiko noticed us and walked over.
The popular Yukikaze was still laughing, looking like she was having fun surrounded by her seniors, her classmates and her middle school juniors.

name: Hebiko
text: What are you doing? You look like you're just lazing around?

name: Me
text: Ah～ Nothing special, but if I must say we were in fact lazing around.

name: Hebiko
text: Y-You don't say... So does that mean that you're done with your homework?

name: Me
text: Homework?

name: Hebiko
text: From Kosaka-sensei, remember? To hand in when the exams are over.

name: Me
text: Didn't do that.
Until last week I was focused entirely on the exams, and there was no way I had done anything other than that.

name: Hebiko
text: Haa... figures. Hebiko will help you, so let's do it together, okay?

name: Shikanosuke
text: Really, Hebiko!? Let's do it!
Shikanosuke stood up as if he had been waiting for this.

name: Me
text: Eh～. I'm gonna pass on this one.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Why, Fuma!? If Hebiko helps us it won't take long.

name: Me
text: Just because. Today is all about relaxing for me!
Considering that exams had only just ended, I definitely was not in the mood to do homework.

name: Hebiko
text: Ehh. But Fuma-chan, you're always relaxing.

name: Me
text: That's what you call an unrecognized genius. Anyway, I'll be going home to play games with Sakura today!

name: Shikanosuke
text: *Tsk* Forget it then. Looks like it's just us, Hebiko.

name: Hebiko
text: You're right. Then for today let's justー

name: Hebiko
text: ーAh... Aaaaaaaah!?

name: Me
text: ...Hebiko?
Hebiko suddenly let out a wild scream.

name: Hebiko
text: Hebiko forgot to give the notebook back! Ohh～ Yukikaze-chan left already, didn't she...?
Hebiko said this as she glanced around the cafeteria with a worried look on her face.

name: Me
text: Why did you borrow a notebook from her?

name: Hebiko
text: Eh? Well, because she's helping Hebiko study.

name: Me
text: Helping you!? You mean, that Yukikaze...!?
I could have understood if it was the opposite. Hebiko already appeared to be a brilliant model student as you could see.

name: Hebiko
text: What are you saying? Unlike you, Yukikaze-chan always gets the top grades in our year.

name: Me
text: Whaaat!? She's actually smart!?
I-I couldn't believe it... She didn't look like the type at all...

name: Shikanosuke
text: Fuma, you've got some niche knowledge and yet don't know much about this do you. I guess that's because you're a loner.

name: Me
text: Don't say that!! A-Anyway... Yukikaze, right...
I also gazed around the cafeteria to check. Just as Hebiko said, Yukikaze was nowhere to be seen.
I tried asking the remaining students, but she had apparently just left saying she had some business to take care of.

name: Me
text: I guess she went back home. Well, it should be okay to wait until tomorrow.

name: Hebiko
text: Hmm. But it will be hard for her to study today without her notebook. Fuma-chan, could you bring it to her?

name: Me
text: Haa!? Why me!?

name: Hebiko
text: You look like you've got nothing better to do, Fuma-chan. And you're not going to do your homework either, right?

name: Me
text: No that's not... That may be true, but why should I go through the hassle...
As I said that, Hebiko glared at me with a pouty look on her face.

name: Hebiko
text: Hmm. Fuma-chan, you're so mean...

name: Hebiko
text: Hebiko always does what Fuma-chan asks, you know? Right, Shikanosuke-chan?

name: Shikanosuke
text: Yeaaah. C'mon Fuma, it's fine right? After all you have nothing to do.

name: Me
text: I-I got it...! Shit, treating me like I'm just a layabout... well, I really have nothing to do though.

name: Hebiko
text: Really!? Yaaay～! Hebiko knew she could count on you, Fuma-chan♪ Please give this to her then.

name: Me
text: Yeah. I just have to bring this note to Yukikaze's house riー Hmm?
When I received the note from Hebiko, I realized something important.

name: Me
text: Wait, hold on a sec. I don't even know where her house is.

name: Hebiko
text: Eh? Seriously?

name: Shikanosuke
text: Didn't you see that girl off to Yukikaze's house?

name: Me
text: No, well, I did but...
By "that girl", she meant Clear, the young girl that we had met before during all that fuss before.
Clear was an augmented human created by a secret organization of the government, meant to kill demons.
However, due to some unknown force, she had been abducted, brainwashed, and sent to Gosha.
Her goal was the assassination of Asagi-sensei.
We were able to prevent that and somehow saved Clear who was being manipulated.
After that, Asagi-sensei, in the interest of Clear's safety, had recommended her to stay there.
And so Clear, who had interacted with Yukikaze quite a bit during the commotion, began to live at her house.
I had agreed to guide her to Yukikaze's house butー

name: Me
text: At that time it was cool to accept it, but after thinking a bit I realized that I don't actually know where Yukikaze's house is.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Fuma, you...

name: Hebiko
text: You need to check this kind of thing first...

name: Me
text: W-Well... I was thinking about what I should do then,

name: Me
text: but by chance she was eating ice cream at Inageya at that time. So I gave Clear to her there.
Now that I mentioned it, I pretty much hadn't seen Clear since that day.
I hoped she was getting along with Yukikaze at her house though...

name: Me
text: ーSo this is how it is. I don't know but what about you two?

name: Hebiko
text: No. Come to think of it Hebiko doesn't know either.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Me either!

name: Me
text: Hmm...?
I looked around the cafeteria and asked Yukikaze's friends who were still there.
In the endーnobody knew where Yukikaze's house was.
...This was strange.
I had started to catch a whiff of some kind of super-special-important hidden "secret"...

name: Me
text: Mwahaha. I see... This is getting interesting!!

name: Hebiko
text: Hey, Shikanosuke-chan. Fuma-chan is making that evil face again.

name: Shikanosuke
text: He is. He must be thinking something weird again.

name: Me
text: I-I am not!! You're curious about this too, aren't you!? Yukikaze's secret house that nobody knows!

name: Hebiko
text: Yukikaze's house?

name: Shikanosuke
text: Well. I guess I am a bit curious but...

name: Me
text: Okay! Then it's decided!! Mwahaha, this should be a good way to keep me busy... no, I mean I sense some adventure here!!

name: Me
text: ーLet's go you two!! We're gonna find Yukikaze's house!!

name: Hebiko and Shikanosuke
text: Ehhh...?
Five minutes later.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Wait, we just wanted to do our homework...

name: Hebiko
text: Fuma-chan just does as he pleases, doesn't he～?

name: Me
text: J-Just come with me! I beg you!!!
Going alone would have taken all the adventure feeling out of it and made it a chore.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Well, we can do that. But why are we at the school building?
We were walking the corridor that led to the teachers' office.

name: Me
text: To gather information. We have no clues about where Yukikaze's house could be.

name: Me
text: If we asked someone like Sakura-sensei, she would probably tell us, right?

name: Shikanosuke
text: We're just going to ask someone? Does that still count as an adventure?
Shikanosuke was looking unconvinced.

name: Me
text: I-It's okay! I'm all for enjoying this but also taking it easy where we canーHmm!?

name: Me
text: This is bad!! Hide yourselves you two!!

name: Hebiko and Shikanosuke
text: Uh?
I hurriedly pulled them into an empty classroom and hid them there. And just thereー

name: Yukikaze
text: Hmm～hmm♪ Hmmmm～♪
Yukikaze came by with a carefree expression, swinging her arms as she walked.
She was still inside the school, so perhaps she had something left to do here.

name: Me
text: Mwahaha, perfect. This is it, like a moth flying into the flame...
She passed in front of us, who were hiding, and walked toward the entrance.
If we followed her like this we would be able to get to Yukikaze's house, which was a secret to everyone.

name: Hebiko
text: Heeeey, Fuma-chan?

name: Me
text: What?
Hebiko pulled my sleeve.

name: Hebiko
text: Shouldn't you just give her the notebook now? Then we won't have to go to her house.

name: Me
text: Mwahaha. You're so naive Hebiko..

name: Hebiko
text: Wh-What!?

name: Me
text: If we do that it won't be an adventure, right!? Yukikaze definitely lives in a crazy secret houseー

name: Me
text: Like at the top of a tall tree, or inside a strange cave in the mountainsー Anyway, it must be an amazing secret house!!

name: Shikanosuke
text: A-At the top of a tree? For real...!? Damn, it's making me curious now!!

name: Me
text: Right!!?

name: Hebiko
text: Shikanosuke-chan you too!? Come on!! There's no way Yukikaze-chan is living in a strange place like that!

name: Me
text: Sheesh. Such a killjoy.

name: Shikanosuke
text: That's because Hebiko has no adventurous spirit.

name: Hebiko
text: What is with the two of you!!?

name: Yukikaze
text: Hmm?

name: Me
text: (Shit!! You're too loud Hebiko!!!)

name: Hebiko
text: Hmgggh!?
I hurried and covered Hebiko's mouth, and we got down low.
And thenー.

name: Yukikaze
text: Hmm. Was it my imagination? Oh well. Time to go hooome～♪
She didn't seem to really care and nonchalantly walked out of the school.

name: Me
text: Alright, we're safe!! Let's follow her!

name: Hebiko
text: No! Hebiko doesn't want to go!

name: Me
text: Ehhh～...? Alright, fine. I'll buy you some ice cream at Inageya, so come on Hebiko.

name: Hebiko
text: I-Ice cream!? Hmm, but...

name: Shikanosuke
text: Let's go Hebiko! It sounds like fun!

name: Hebiko
text: I guess... Just for a little bit then, okay?

name: Me
text: That's the way!
This was how we decided to follow Yukikaze on her way home.

name: Old Lady
text: Thank you as always～. Be careful on your way home, Yukikaze-chan.

name: Yukikaze
text: I wiiiill! See you tomorrow granny～♪
It looked like she had gone out of her way to buy ice cream.
Yukikaze came out of Inageya and walked as she was eating.

name: Yukikaze
text: Hmm～♪ Hmmhmmm～♪

name: Shikanosuke
text: Oh! Look Fuma, Yukikaze is headed for the mountains!

name: Me
text: Hmm... I knew it, her house isn't in the village...
It felt like the mystery had deepened.
What truths lied in wait for us?

name: Me
text: Anyway, keep after her!! We'll buy some ice cream too and then follow Yukikaze!

name: Shikanosuke
text: Got it!!

name: Hebiko
text: Yaaay～. Ice cream♪ Ice cream♪
We went even deeper into the isolated mountains.
Yukikaze arrived in a tranquil area where terraced rice fields were lined up.

name: Yukikaze
text: Hmmhmm. Around here should be good～

name: Me
text: What is she doing?
Yukikaze was doing something, looking at a field covered in water.

name: Shikanosuke
text: She's... fishing? She put some fish stick on a line and is fishing for crawfish.

name: Me
text: Whaaat!?
Indeed, it was exactly as Shikanosuke saidー.
Yukikaze was filling her mouth with the Inageya ice cream as she amused herself by fishing crawfish.

name: Me
text: There's something weird about this!! Why was she carrying around a crawfish fishing set!?

name: Hebiko
text: Hehehe. Yukikaze-chan is so cute♪

name: Yukikaze
text: Yes! This is big one♪
Did she catch one that satisfied her?
Yukikaze stood up and walked along ploddingly again.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Oh!? She's on the move again, Fuma!

name: Me
text: Y-Yeah... but, you don't think she's noticed we were following her and is just having fun with us do you...?
Yukikaze left the terraced rice fields area and went into the mountains.

name: Yukikaze
text: Hmmhmm♪ Hmmm～♪

name: Shikanosuke
text: She's going deeper into the mountains... So does this mean her house is at the top of a tree...!?

name: Me
text: She's a feral child who fishes crawfishes on her way back home. I've also heard that she was raised by a huge wild dog.

name: Shikanosuke
text: For real!?

name: Hebiko
text: Come on. She's not some kind of forest princess.
As we were discussing and following her, Yukikaze went off the road to head even deeper into the mountains.

name: Me
text: What in the!? How far is she going exactly!?

name: Shikanosuke
text: Right!? That must be some strange monster who turned into Yukikaze to trick us, right!?

name: Yukikaze
text: Hmm?
At that moment, Yukikaze stopped in her tracks.
We hurried and hid ourselves behind a tree.
Then, the bushes in front of Yukikaze trembled with a rustling sound.

name: Animals
text: Grrrrrr... Hiiiisss...

name: Shikanosuke
text: S-Something came out!? That'sーAnimal Taimanin that can only be tamed by Sakura-sensei!!
For the defense of Gosha, these animals with Taimanin powers were let loose in the mountains.
They could only be tamed by Sakura-sensei who was their caretaker, and would mercilessly attack any intruder.
The ferocious animals surrounded Yukikaze, and slowlyー

name: Hebiko
text: Y-Yukikaze-chan is in danger!! We need to save herー

name: Me
text: No, wait, Hebiko!!!
I instantly stopped Hebiko.

name: Me
text: (They're not... attacking her!?)

name: Shinobi Bear
text: Grrr, grrrrr!

name: Shinobi Snake
text: Hiiiiisss～
They were actually being rather submissive to her.
They clearly were afraid and greeting her as if she were their senior.

name: Yukikaze
text: Hmmhmm♪ Good work as always～♪
Yukikaze gave the animals the crawfish she had caught earlier.
And she gave them the stick of the ice cream she had just eaten as if to tell them to throw it away.

name: Shinobi Bear
text: Roaar!!
The shinobi bear skillfully took the ice cream stick and seemed to be saying "Understood!!".

name: Hebiko
text: Wow! Yukikaze-chan even gets along with the Animal Taimanin. So nice♪

name: Me
text: No, that definitely feels like they're her underlings through brute force...

name: Shinobi Bear
text: Roar! Rooooooaaar!!

name: Shinobi Snake
text: Hiiiiisss!!

name: Yukikaze
text: Hmmhmm♪ See you later～♪
The animals were lining up single file as if to thank her and see her off.
They escorted her, and Yukikaze headed even deeper into the mountains.

name: Me
text: A-Anyway! I don't really get what happened here, but let's go too!

name: Shikanosuke
text: Y-Yeah!! But Yukikaze is really impressive, just as I thoughtー
At that moment.
The bushes behind us trembled and the Animal Taimanin showed themselves.

name: Animals
text: Grrr...? Hiiiissss...!

name: Me
text: Ah.
This was very bad...
